verses.text: In the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w*, of the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of the \w Medes|strong="H4074"\w*, which was made \w king|strong="H4427"\w* over the \w realm|strong="H4438"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*;\f + \fr 9.1 \ft which: or, in which he\f*

In the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of his \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* I \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w* \w understood|strong="H0995"\w* by \w books|strong="H5612"\w* the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, whereof the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, that he would \w accomplish|strong="H4390"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in the \w desolations|strong="H2723"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

¶ And I \w set|strong="H5414"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* unto the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* by \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* and \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w*, with \w fasting|strong="H6685"\w*, and \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, and \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w*:

And I \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and made my \w confession|strong="H3034"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w O|strong="H0577"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and \w dreadful|strong="H3372"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w keeping|strong="H8104"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* and \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* to them that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* him, and to them that \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*;

We have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, and have committed \w iniquity|strong="H5753"\w*, and have done \w wickedly|strong="H7561"\w*, and have \w rebelled|strong="H4775"\w*, even by \w departing|strong="H5493"\w* from thy \w precepts|strong="H4687"\w* and from thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*:

Neither have we \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, which \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* in thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* to our \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, our \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and to all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \add belongeth\add* unto thee, but unto us \w confusion|strong="H1322"\w* of \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*, as at this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; to the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and to the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and unto all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add that are\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*, and \add that are\add* far \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, through all the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* whither thou hast \w driven|strong="H5080"\w* them, because of their \w trespass|strong="H4604"\w* that they have \w trespassed|strong="H4603"\w* against thee.\f + \fr 9.7 \ft belongeth…: or, thou hast\f*

O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, to us \add belongeth\add* \w confusion|strong="H1322"\w* of \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, to our \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, to our \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and to our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, because we have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against thee.

To the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add belong\add* \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* and \w forgivenesses|strong="H5547"\w*, though we have \w rebelled|strong="H4775"\w* against him;

Neither have we \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in his \w laws|strong="H8451"\w*, which he \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* us \w by|strong="H3027"\w* his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*.

Yea, all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* have \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* thy \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, even by \w departing|strong="H5493"\w*, that they might not \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*; therefore the \w curse|strong="H0423"\w* is \w poured|strong="H5413"\w* upon us, and the \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* that \add is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, because we have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against him.

And he hath \w confirmed|strong="H6965"\w* his \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* against us, and against our \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* that \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* us, by \w bringing|strong="H0935"\w* upon us a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: for under the whole \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* hath not been \w done|strong="H6213"\w* as hath been \w done|strong="H6213"\w* upon \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

As \add it is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, all this \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon us: yet made we not our \w prayer|strong="H2470"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that we might \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from our \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, and \w understand|strong="H7919"\w* thy \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*.\f + \fr 9.13 \ft made…: Heb. intreated we not the face of the, etc\f*

Therefore hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w watched|strong="H8245"\w* upon the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* it upon us: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* in all his \w works|strong="H4639"\w* which he \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w*: for we \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* not his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.

And now, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that hast \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* with a \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and hast \w gotten|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w renown|strong="H8034"\w*, as at this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; we have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, we have done \w wickedly|strong="H7561"\w*.\f + \fr 9.15 \ft gotten…: Heb. made thee a name\f*

¶ O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, according to all thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, I beseech thee, let thine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* and thy \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* be turned \w away|strong="H7725"\w* from thy \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*: because for our \w sins|strong="H2399"\w*, and for the \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* of our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* and thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add are become\add* a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* to all \add that are\add* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* us.

Now therefore, O our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and his \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w*, and cause thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to \w shine|strong="H0215"\w* upon thy \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* that is \w desolate|strong="H8076"\w*, for the \w Lord’s|strong="H0136"\w* sake.

O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w incline|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*; \w open|strong="H6491"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* our \w desolations|strong="H8074"\w*, and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* which is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: for we do not \w present|strong="H5307"\w* our \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee for our \w righteousnesses|strong="H6666"\w*, but for thy \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w*.\f + \fr 9.18 \ft which…: Heb. whereupon thy name is called\f*\f + \fr 9.18 \ft present: Heb. cause to fall\f*

O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*; O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w*; O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \w hearken|strong="H7181"\w* and \w do|strong="H6213"\w*; \w defer|strong="H0309"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*, for thine own sake, O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for thy \w city|strong="H5892"\w* and thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* are \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

¶ And whiles I \add was\add* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w*, and \w praying|strong="H6419"\w*, and \w confessing|strong="H3034"\w* my \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* and the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w presenting|strong="H5307"\w* my \w supplication|strong="H8467"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*;

Yea, whiles I \add was\add* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* in \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, even the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w Gabriel|strong="H1403"\w*, whom I had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* in the \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* at the \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w*, being caused to \w fly|strong="H3286"\w* \w swiftly|strong="H3288"\w*, \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* me about the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w oblation|strong="H4503"\w*.\f + \fr 9.21 \ft swiftly: Heb. with weariness, or, flight\f*

And he \w informed|strong="H0995"\w* \add me\add*, and \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with me, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, I am now come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to give thee \w skill|strong="H7919"\w* and \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*.\f + \fr 9.22 \ft to…: Heb. to make thee skilful of\f*

At the \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* of thy \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w* the \w commandment|strong="H1697"\w* came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and I am \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* \add thee;\add* for thou \add art\add* greatly \w beloved|strong="H2532"\w*: therefore \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w consider|strong="H0995"\w* the \w vision|strong="H4758"\w*.\f + \fr 9.23 \ft commandment: Heb. word\f*\f + \fr 9.23 \ft greatly…: Heb. a man of desires\f*

\w Seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w* are \w determined|strong="H2852"\w* upon thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and upon thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, to \w finish|strong="H3607"\w* the \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*, and to make an \w end|strong="H8552"\w* of \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*, and to make \w reconciliation|strong="H3722"\w* for \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, and to bring \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and to seal \w up|strong="H2856"\w* the \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* and \w prophecy|strong="H5030"\w*, and to \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6944"\w*.\f + \fr 9.24 \ft finish: or, restrain\f*\f + \fr 9.24 \ft make an…: or, seal up\f*\f + \fr 9.24 \ft prophecy: Heb. prophet\f*

\w Know|strong="H3045"\w* therefore and \w understand|strong="H7919"\w*, \add that\add* from the going \w forth|strong="H4161"\w* of the \w commandment|strong="H1697"\w* to \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* and to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* unto the \w Messiah|strong="H4899"\w* the \w Prince|strong="H5057"\w* \add shall be\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w*, and \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w*: the \w street|strong="H7339"\w* shall be \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and the \w wall|strong="H2742"\w*, even in \w troublous|strong="H6695"\w* \w times|strong="H6256"\w*.\f + \fr 9.25 \ft be built…: Heb. return and be built\f*\f + \fr 9.25 \ft wall: or, breach, or, ditch\f*\f + \fr 9.25 \ft troublous: Heb. strait of\f*

And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w* shall \w Messiah|strong="H4899"\w* be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*, but not for himself: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w prince|strong="H5057"\w* that shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* shall \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* and the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*; and the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* thereof \add shall be\add* with a \w flood|strong="H7858"\w*, and unto the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* of the \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w desolations|strong="H8074"\w* are \w determined|strong="H2782"\w*.\f + \fr 9.26 \ft but…: or, and shall have nothing\f*\f + \fr 9.26 \ft desolations…: or, it shall be cut off by desolations\f*

And he shall \w confirm|strong="H1396"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with \w many|strong="H7227"\w* for \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w week|strong="H7620"\w*: and in the \w midst|strong="H2677"\w* of the \w week|strong="H7620"\w* he shall cause the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* and the \w oblation|strong="H4503"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*, and for the \w overspreading|strong="H3671"\w* of \w abominations|strong="H8251"\w* he shall make \add it\add* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, even until the \w consummation|strong="H3617"\w*, and that \w determined|strong="H2782"\w* shall be \w poured|strong="H5413"\w* upon the \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*.\f + \fr 9.27 \ft the covenant: or, a covenant\f*\f + \fr 9.27 \ft for the…: or, with the abominable armies\f*\f + \fr 9.27 \ft the desolate: or, the desolator\f*
